body_html: @varunagrawal yes, I have it working, both for ROIPooling and ROIAlign. I was planning on not integrating it to pytorch core, but instead to use the new JIT extensions added in #4842, and to showcase how one can extend PyTorch with C/CUDA without having to modify PyTorch code or writing messy build files.
body_text: @varunagrawal yes, I have it working, both for ROIPooling and ROIAlign. I was planning on not integrating it to pytorch core, but instead to use the new JIT extensions added in #4842, and to showcase how one can extend PyTorch with C/CUDA without having to modify PyTorch code or writing messy build files.
body: @varunagrawal yes, I have it working, both for `ROIPooling` and `ROIAlign`. I was planning on not integrating it to pytorch core, but instead to use the new JIT extensions added in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/4842, and to showcase how one can extend PyTorch with C/CUDA without having to modify PyTorch code or writing messy build files.
